content.question: The sides of the rectangle above increase in such a way that <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>d</mi><mi>z</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BED@</annotation> </semantics> </math> and <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mfrac> <mrow> <mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4004@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. At the instant when x = 4 and y = 3 , what is the value of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A2A@</annotation> </semantics> </math>?

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
